def.component: flex flex-col items-center justify-around mt-10 space-y-1 w-full h-auto
def.tableTop: flex justify-center items-center px-5 w-[75%] border-2 border-black bg-slate-400 bg-opacity-60 rounded-sm
def.title: font-black text-center text-2xl text-red-900
def.search: rounded-sm opacity-60 border-black border-2 px-1 self-center outline-none focus:border-gray-500
def.table: flex justify-start w-[75%] space-y-1 bg-slate-400 h-80 border-black border-solid border-2 bg-opacity-60
def.theadRow: flex flex-col h-[98%] justify-around w-full items-start pt-1 bg-slate-400 bg-opacity-60
def.tbody: flex justify-start items-center space-x-2 overflow-x-auto overflow-y-hidden pl-1 h-[98%] table-scroll w-[80%] bg-slate-300 bg-opacity-60
def.tbodyRow: flex h-[98%] pl-1 pr-1 justify-around items-center flex-col bg-slate-200 bg-opacity-60
